page.title: 07The Mayor of Fareham
page.content: On the 2nd June 1985 we visited the office of Mayor of Fareham.It has been going since 1974. Before you can become Mayor you have to be a member of the town council. The mayor told us that her main duties are being chairman of the council, and meeting as many people as possible. These main duties have changed considerably since the original Domesday book was written, in the reign of William the Conqueror.The black background on the Mayor's badge is there to represent the Iron industry, the ship is gold, and the flag is the flag of St. George. The motto on the badge reads "Prest a Faire" meaning "Ready to Act". The chain around the Mayor's neck is gold and it is inscribed with the names of recent Mayors.The Mayor showed us her robes which are red, white and black.
